fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, shoot someone. (Two uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your shot will miss if your target is Town, has defense or is detection immune.
- If you miss your shot, it will not be publicly revealed that you missed.
- Your shot can be fooled by frames and disguises.
- When you successfully shoot someone, no Gunslinger may attempt to shoot again that day.
